title: Google Pixel battery inop after last update. Only displays 1% but lasts all day. Confusing.
content:
Once unplugged from a full charge (original factory charger and tested on multiple outlets), battery drains to 1% within two hours, yet lasts all day. This happened the same day I updated my software. Frustrating because I never know if it is actually going to die on me any minute. 

I have completed a Factory Reset, restarted in Safe Mode and taken it in to Verizon.

Verizon just told me to buy a new phone... Seems awfully convenient.
